My only complaint about Chatterer now is that it always opens with the UI open since I updated to the newer one, even if I select / unselect use craft specific settings.

It used to just sit as a little icon unless I specifically click on the icon to open the settings, now each time I launch to test out something I need to click the icon to close the settings box... other than that I am very happy with Chatterer, it keeps the boredom of a nearly totally silent game from discouraging me from playing.
